title: Black Jack: Sora kara Kita Kodomo
original_name: ブラック・ジャック 空からきた子ども
sinopse: An army plane defects from the U-ran (Uranium) Union and lands in Black Jack's garden carrying a family. Their purpose is to have their son, who is suffering from an incurable disease, treated by Black Jack. But it is beyond even BJ's ability to cure the disease.
